abstract: Robyn Weintraub has her finger on the pulse of us crossword solvers.
snippet: Robyn Weintraub has her finger on the pulse of us crossword solvers.
lead_paragraph: Administrivial Blog Delay Alert! Due to it being mating season among the emus — and some scheduled website maintenance besides — the blog post for the Wednesday, August 12 puzzle, which normally posts Tuesday at 10:00 p.m. Eastern, will be delayed until 5:00 a.m Eastern Wednesday. The crossword puzzle will be live Tuesday night at 10:00 p.m., as scheduled.
